tweets.text: @EzraJNewman Does LLM-generated code count? Or giving users access to LLM directly?

there is no use making fiction; i would rather spend a lifetime of fruitless documentary work to, at least once, capture the magic of our amazing un-scripted reality the way this video does https://t.co/euXkhNCArA

@mdavidallen the former, though I agree (I would want something like this https://t.co/AHxHvZ2j9X)
i still think we should be having end-to-end pgp encrypted conversations as private messages on public irc servers but no one asked me
i really do not like signal being down

@infowetrust There is an... er.. learning curve. But after six+ months I am fully in love with my ergodox, strongly recommend (took me two weeks to get used to ortho + retrain my fingers for the split) https://t.co/Txar5ZJj3B
@iamjimmyo @databyler nothing is outside the algorithms anymore, and the things they don't understand properly they wreak havoc on https://t.co/zP2WgNREIV

I really want to live in the alternate universe where Twitter didn't ruin the developer APIs in order to sell ads and we all had custom clients with tweaked open source algorithms we all shared to give ourselves the best experience https://t.co/ojLEqRnhYU

@databyler but given our beautiful massive network of interconnected thought, isn't it strange that there isn't a single service that can reliably act as a sort of meta-bellweather of public thought and opinion?
@mdavidallen Agreed. So, uh,  @Twitter if you wanna hire me to be your realtime Twitter meta-reporter I am all about it
my dad found this photo from a strange alternate universe / previous life where I played goalie in the local soccer league, tf is this kid https://t.co/uRvDfXYuyI

They half tried with Moments, but Twitter would really benefit from employing network-focused reporters to help explain trending topics in realtime, as we can see you cannot real automate anything besides “this is big!” which is easily gamed and not that informative anyway
Hashtags are not a vote and should not be treated as such. Trending is not always a positive thing.

Using model of IRC channels that hashtags are based on- this is like a bunch of users joining a channel to trash it, which is not atypical. Users who want to spend time on a subject gather somewhere, and people who disagree are attracted. 

The issue is in the reporting. https://t.co/cLlYkKIYEX

Coding in my kitchen as I eat a microwaved donut so life is pretty good
Latest Reply All podcast episode, #9 is a must-listen. Perfect example of moving storytelling, a personal and cultural story, and in 20m.
RT @kiaspeaks: Don't let your schools trick you into the "more instructional time, no recess" bull. Kids need to play EVERYDAY!
Almost home. Exhausted.
Heading back to NY =[
@enjalot What have I doneeee http://t.co/e2yQYuoS
Can someone channel Hunter S. Thompson and have him write an article on the current gun control debate? I need some of that.

Look for recommendations of good books on Oakland history, activist/otherwise. cc @marymad @hyphy_republic @OccupiedOakTrib
And then I found out Venetian Snares' entire catalog is on Spotify. And then I listened to that album in Romanian or whatever I can't say.
Added an explanatory one-pager for my Quantify Yourself app http://t.co/iIwqSydN
I watch CSI with my back to the TV and solve all their mysteries by sound.
@marcfawzi I love Tangle! I actually used it in the 2nd paragraph of the CEO Pay section of my Inequality piece http://t.co/tAe67XWy
Saying I'm a "Dataviz Designer" feels kinda like saying "Typography Designer" - I care about tiny details no one / everyone cares about.
#oo #ftp As one person said in #ogp after; "We just marched all thru the city and nothing was broken! There were no fires!" - Good.
Back from #occupyoakland #ftp Fuck The Police march, and honestly I think it was a positive step forward. We are growing wiser, I think.
#ftp #occupyoakland #oo - I'm heading to Frank Ogawa to see what's up and record some audio. I have the feeling the night is not over.
#ftp #occupyoakland I will probably be heading out into the street myself pretty soon so I won't be able to update the map.
#occupyoakland #oo #ftp #ows- TRYING TO UPDATE GOOGLE MAP LIVE WITH 5-0 LOCATIONS, help out! http://t.co/RBBKARAK”
@OakFoSho I appreciate your non violent perspective, but there is real stuff happening in Oakland. Please focus on currently NV #ftp march.
RT @timeoutcorner: @PfailBlog: "These are not normal cops, they operate outside the law. They attack someone without warning." #FTP #OO  ...
Frankly, not enjoying helicopters over Oakland… #occupyoakland has changed my visceral reaction to the sound… puts my stomach in a knot.
#occupyoakland #oo #ftp #ows- I am working on a live map of the Jan14th Fuck The Police march, help out! http://t.co/RBBKARAK
@HarryElephante I live near 14th and Jefferson so I guess they'll be passing me as well...
@HarryElephante What street? What direction are they heading?
I am working on a live map of #opd location for #ftp march- it should be editable by anyone? Let me know: http://t.co/RBBKARAK
RT @ona_boat: 5 OPD vans on 14th and clay, and some cars, saw group of cops looking @ printed pics of protestors #ftp #oo
ATTN: #occupyoakland regarding #FTP - I went through OPD Crowd Control Policy for most relevant pieces, collected here: http://t.co/UtzJmKOk
@Ergoat Thanks for keeping track of the scanner. Keep up the good work. Will be paying special attention to your feed.
Aw Jersey Shore you're melting my heart
Delicious beverages are the key to a good life.
@allanlasser I think I'll make that... I have a little seltzer and a little POM. Sounds delicious.
I think I've gotten more new music in the last few months than any other amount of time in my life previously.
iTunes shuffle decides this will be a beatles-y afternoon.
Holy shit. A plane just crashed into the hudson river.
Listening to Rilo Kiley. I love Jenny Lewis.
Watching Weeds.
I love the little laughs girls make when they're crying. It's pretty much the cutest thing.
Cut myself while cutting chocolate before... still hurts a little.
The only part I don't like about MPP- Bluish. Can't handle sour notes in my songs. Too bad.
How wonderful that I might be able to be alive the day Marijuana is legal... and I'll probably be of-age as well by that point.
I spend a lot of time self-congratulating.
The answer to "I'm bored; what to do?" for the last few days has been Merriweather Post Pavilion. Wonderful, really.
Dinner was alright. It wasn't ruined, but it wasn't good. Merely okay. A learning experience, certainly. I think I could make it good next.
Eragon is probably the worst video game I've ever played. More later.
Still very sick, but feeling ever so slightly better. =[
Tumblr: Photo http://tinyurl.com/2hbglw
Tumblr: Photo http://tinyurl.com/2fj4tu
Watching Juno. I feel horrible.

commits.message: feat: Handle Obsidian as CMS; wikilinks, rsync yarn script, filter blog list by frontmatter, modified date
style: fix spacing on blog index table of contents
style: remove red borders, that was dumb
fix: behavior for hash IDs; go to hash when there is one, otherwise scroll to top on page change
feat: add better sort/filter on blog index
build: update node version in .nvmrc file
Merge branch 'sync-obsidian-init' of https://github.com/ejfox/website into sync-obsidian-init
build: update yarn.lock from clean install
refactor: v-if=page everything, because sometimes there is no page?
feat: posts with `hidden: true` in frontmatter are not listed, but still accessible
refactor: no fancy styling for internal links to pages that do not exist yet
